name: AccumulateLoyaltyPoints
description:
Add points to a loyalty account for a purchase.

This tool adds loyalty points to a customer's account following a purchase. It can be used with or without the Orders API. If using the Orders API, provide the `order_id` for automatic point calculation based on the program and promotions. If not, manually compute and provide the `points` to add.

parameters.name: loyalty_account_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the target loyalty account to which points will be added.

value_schema.description: The ID of the target [loyalty account](entity:LoyaltyAccount).

parameters.name: unique_request_id
parameters.description: A unique string identifier for the `AccumulateLoyaltyPoints` request. Must be unique for each request to ensure idempotency.

value_schema.description:
A unique string that identifies the `AccumulateLoyaltyPoints` request. 
Keys can be any valid string but must be unique for every request.

parameters.name: purchase_location_id
parameters.description: The ID of the location where the purchase was made, necessary for loyalty point accumulation.

value_schema.description: The [location](entity:Location) where the purchase was made.

parameters.name: loyalty_program_id
parameters.description: The ID of the loyalty program to add points to. Required to identify the correct program.

parameters.name: points_to_accumulate
parameters.description: Specify the number of points to add to the loyalty account from the purchase event if not using the Orders API.

value_schema.description: The number of points accumulated by the event.

parameters.name: order_id_for_accumulation
parameters.description: The ID of the order for which points are accumulated. Required if using the Orders API.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the [order](entity:Order) for which the buyer accumulated the points.
This field is returned only if the Orders API is used to process orders.
